Jonny lays down some blistering alternative country tunes in the vein of The Rolling StonesÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œCountry Honk.ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½  He freely admits to his old school roots, even to his Dylanesque adventures, but let me assure you itÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s all about the process of building, and to that end Jonny Kaplan & The Lazy Stars are one of the hardest working bands out there.  Jonny seems to have effortlessly managed to capture a timeless feel for the seamy underbelly of life, making the darker side sound like the summer pulp fiction adventures of an outlaw on the run ...
